name: Mountain No Reason
description:
Every day brings a blank map of a new world. But there’s always a mountain.

Why? No reason.

Choose an area to start drawing. You can follow the prompt - or just draw what you like!

When you’re ready to move on, click the done button.

⚠️Work in progress - prompts are liable to change! ⚠️

Credits:

  • EaselJS/CreateJS
  • jQuery
  • Patrick Hand on Google Fonts
  • Google Material Symbols
  • seedrandom.js by David Bau
  • EncodePath.js by Brett Johnson
